name: 灯織
text:
──はい、お茶
冷たいので良かった？
trans:
──Here, have some tea.
Is cold alright with you?

name: 真乃
text:
ありがとう。汗かいちゃったから、
冷たいの、うれしいな
trans:
Thank you. I worked up a sweat,
so I'd really like some cold tea.

name: 灯織
text:
……今頃、めぐるもどこかで
お弁当を食べてるんだよね
trans:
... Right now, Meguru should be
eating her lunch somewhere too.

name: 真乃
text:
うん……めぐるちゃんの好きなものが
たくさん入ったお弁当だといいな……
trans:
Yeah... I hope her lunch is filled
with lots of her favorite dishes...

name: めぐる
text: あーっ！
trans: Aah!

name: めぐる
text: 真乃っ！　灯織ーっ！
trans: Mano! Hioriii!

name: 真乃＆灯織
text: めぐるちゃん……っ
trans: Meguru-chan...

name: めぐる
text: 会いたかったよー、真乃ーっ！！
trans: I missed you so much, Mano!!

name: 真乃
text:
ふふっ……めぐるちゃん……っ
お昼は一緒でいいの？
trans:
Heehee... Meguru-chan...
Is it okay for us to eat lunch together?

name: めぐる
text:
いいんだって！
もうもう、この時間を目一杯堪能するよーっ！
trans:
They said it's okay!
And now, I gotta get my fill during this time!

name: めぐる
text:
灯織もごめんね！
色々びっくりしたでしょー？
trans:
Sorry about earlier too, Hiori!
I surprised you a lot, didn't I?

name: 灯織
text:
う、ううんっ……
それは大丈夫……だけど……
trans:
N-No...
Don't worry about it... but...

name: 灯織
text:
ちょっと……ここスタッフさんもいるから……
あ、汗もかいてるし……！
trans:
There's staff members here too... so...
And I'm all sweaty...!

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、それはわたしもだ……！
ごめんっ……えへへ……
trans:
Ah, me too...!
Sorry about that... Eheheh...

name: めぐる
text:
もういただきますしちゃった？
じゃあ、わたしも……いただきまーす！
trans:
Have you guys started eating yet?
In that case, I'll start too... Let's dig in!

name: めぐる
text: （もぐもぐ……ごくん）
trans: (Munch, munch... gulp)

name: めぐる
text:
──さっきまではね？
ごはんどころじゃないって思ってたんだけど
trans:
──So anyways, just now, right?
I was thinking "This is no time for lunch!"

name: めぐる
text: お弁当を見た瞬間、お腹ぺっこぺこ……！
trans:
But as soon as I saw the lunch boxes, I felt really 
hungry...!

name: 灯織
text: ふふっ……似たもの同士
trans: Fufu... Birds of a feather.

name: 灯織
text:
真乃も『お弁当』って聞いた瞬間、
お腹が空いてることに気付いてたよね？
trans:
Mano, the moment you heard the word "lunch"
you realized you were hungry, right?

name: 真乃
text: ほわっ
trans: Howah!

name: めぐる
text:
真乃とお揃い？
でも、わたしの方が一歩遅かったかー！
trans:
Mano and I were the same?
But, I guess I noticed a little later!

name: 灯織
text: 大して変わらない
trans: There's no big difference, really.

name: 真乃
text: ふふっ、お腹がぐーって教えてくれたんだっ
trans: Hehe, my tummy rumbled and told me it was hungry.

name: めぐる
text: ねー！
trans: Right!?

name: めぐる
text: 灯織はどう？
trans: Hiori, what about you?

name: 灯織
text: 私は……
trans: As for me...

name: 灯織
text: まだそんなに空いてないかな
trans: I wasn't all that hungry.

name: めぐる
text:
朝もあんまり食べてなかったでしょ？
長時間バスに乗るからーって
trans:
You didn't eat much this morning, right?
Because we were taking a long bus trip, you said.

name: めぐる
text:
いっぱい動いてるから、
ちゃんと食べないと元気でないよ……？
trans:
We moved around a lot, so if you don't eat properly,
you won't have enough energy for later, you know...?

name: 灯織
text: でも、あんまり……
trans: But, I'm not that...

name: めぐる
text: そっかぁ……
trans: I see...

name: めぐる
trans: Hmm...

name: めぐる
text: ……なんにも気にしなくていいんだよ？
trans: ... You don't have to worry about it, okay?

name: 灯織
trans: ... Huh?

name: めぐる
text:
わたしがオニになった後、
ほとんどミッションクリアしてないなー……
trans:
After I was turned into a demon,
it seems that you barely cleared any missions, so...

name: めぐる
text: だからもしかしたら、って
trans: So I thought, maybe, just maybe...

name: 真乃
text: ……うん
trans: ...Yeah.

name: 真乃
text:
灯織ちゃんと、
めぐるちゃんを取り戻す方法を考えてたの
trans:
Hiori-chan and I were thinking of
ways to bring you back, Meguru-chan

name: めぐる
text: 方法があるの……？
trans: Is there really a way...?

name: めぐる
text: あっ、ごめん今のなし今のなし……！
trans: Ah, sorry, forget what I just said...!

name: めぐる
text:
えっと……方法が見つかったら嬉しいけど……
わたしのことは後回しでいいから
trans:
Umm... I'd be really glad if you found a way, but...
You can leave my issue for later.

name: めぐる
text:
……この学校の高校生にとって、
今日は本当に大事なイベントだと思うんだ
trans:
... For the students of this high school,
today is really an important event for them, I think.

name: めぐる
text:
だから、ミッションクリアで学園祭を盛り上げる！
『宝物』も守り抜いて、絶対に中止させないっ
trans:
So you need to clear missions to liven things up! 
And you have to protect the "treasure" to make sure
the festival doesn't end early!

name: めぐる
text:
『みんなに輝きを届けようっ！』
それが、イルミネーションスターズでしょ？
trans:
"Let's get our light across to everyone!"
That's illumination STARS, right?

name: 灯織
text: はぁ……
trans: Haah...

name: 灯織
text:
そうだよね……
めぐるならそう考えるよね……
trans:
That's completely right...
Meguru, of course that's what you'd say...

name: 灯織
text:
私、めぐるを取り戻すことに必死になって……
……そこまで頭が回らなかった
trans:
I was so preoccupied with trying to get you back...
... that I didn't even think that far.

name: めぐる
text: えっ、あっ……！
trans: Eh, aah...!

name: 真乃
text:
ひ、灯織ちゃん……っ
それは私も、だから……っ
trans:
H-Hiori-chan...
I was the same too, so...

name: 灯織
text:
めぐるをひとりぼっちにしたらかわいそうって、
思っちゃってた……ごめんなさい
trans:
I was just feeling sorry for Meguru
because she'd be all alone...Please forgive me.

name: めぐる
text: ……ううん……

name: めぐる
trans: ───No, it's alright...

name: めぐる
text: ……あのね！
trans: ... Umm, hey!

name: めぐる
text:
ふたりに迷惑かけちゃってるのは本当にごめん！
なんだけど……
trans:
I really am sorry for giving you two trouble!
But...

name: めぐる
text: わたしがオニっていうのも結構、面白いかもなって！
trans:
Having me become a demon is a pretty interesting 
twist too!

name: めぐる
text:
こんな機会でも無いと、
なかなか競えないと思うんだよねっ
trans:
Without this kind of opportunity,
we wouldn't have many chances to compete like this.

name: めぐる
text: 足の速さとか！
trans: Like seeing who's faster and stuff!

name: 真乃＆灯織
text: ……ふふっ
trans: ... Hehe.

name: 灯織
text: ……陸上部の強力な助っ人さんが何を言ってるの？
trans:
... What is the star assistant of the Track and Field 
team saying?

name: めぐる
text:
最初から勝ち負けが決まってる
競技なんて無いんだよー？
trans:
It's not really a competition
if the winner is decided from the start, right?

name: めぐる
text:
いい汗をかくのが楽しいの！
真乃と灯織、それからわたしの勝負だよ！
trans:
It's fun to break a sweat like this!
This is a competition, between Mano and Hiori, and me!

name: めぐる
text: 全力で──
trans: Let's go at full power!

name: 灯織
text: 全力……
trans: Full power...

name: 真乃
text: 全力で……っ
trans: At full power...

name: スタッフ
text:
すみませーん。櫻木さん、風野さん、
少し打ち合わせしてもよろしいでしょうかー？
trans:
Excuse me. Sakuragi-san, Kazano-san,
will you join us for a short briefing?

name: 真乃
text: あっ、はい──
trans: Ah, yes──

name: めぐる
text:
いってらっしゃい！
空のお弁当は片付けとくよ
trans:
Go on ahead!
I'll clean up the empty lunch boxes.

name: めぐる
text: わたしもあと少しで食べ終わるから！
trans: I'll finish my lunch soon, anyway!

name: 灯織
text:
うん、しっかり食べて。水分補給も忘れずに
……お茶のおかわり、そこだから
trans:
Alright, make sure to eat enough. 
And don't forget to stay hydrated... 
You can refill your tea over there.

name: めぐる
text:
あ、おかわりできたんだ！
了解だよー！　また後でねっ
trans:
Ah, there's refills too!
I got it! See you later!

name: プロデューサー
text:
お疲れ様
お昼ごはんは食べたか？
trans:
Good work earlier.
Have you had your lunch?

name: 真乃
text: はいっ、おいしくいただきましたっ
trans: Yes, it was very tasty!

name: 真乃
text:
今、灯織ちゃんと打ち合わせに呼ばれて……
めぐるちゃんはまだ控室で食べてます
trans:
Hiori and I were just called up to join a briefing...
Meguru-chan's still eating in the green room.

name: プロデューサー
text:
わかった、いってらっしゃい
何か困ったことがあったら呼んでくれ
trans:
Alright, see you later.
If there's any trouble, call me up, alright?

name: 真乃
text: はいっ
trans: Alright!

name: 灯織
text: いってきます
trans: See you later.

name: プロデューサー
text: （真乃も灯織も、少し肩の力が抜けたようだな──）
trans: (Looks like Mano and Hiori were able to relax a little──)

name: プロデューサー
text: （めぐるは──）
trans: (As for Meguru──)
